title: Inside the MAAP x Jayco Marriage: Why Cycling’s Hippest Brand Kept the WorldTour Waiting
content:
Cult favorite cycling stylistas waited for all the stars to align before it put grey bibs into the pro peloton: 'This feels like the perfect moment in the journey of MAAP.'

Read the full article at Inside the MAAP x Jayco Marriage: Why Cycling’s Hippest Brand Kept the WorldTour Waiting on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
